title: Karma needs another rework
body:
Anyone else agree?

Sure she does alot of damage, no where near as much as any other midlaners.

Sure she has a utility, no where near as much as lulu nami or thresh. Even bard is arguably better.

Karma has no niche. She lacks damage to play solo lanes and lacks enough utility to be a succesful support. 

Arguably on the current state of the game she may be quite good. She is afterall a strong early game duelist, up to lvl 4 she is arguably one of the strongest champions in the game and as we have seen games are often decided in the first 10 to 15 minutes. However this is preseason and things will change in these next two months and likely not in karmas favour.

As to how karma should be changed i am unsure, though i do believe she needs to bevome either a true utility support similar to lulu and nami or become a pure damage solo laner.

Please leave your thoughs guys

replies.body: I agree, she could do with a more defined niche.
Lol she does not lack damage. What she lacks is hard CC but considering she has 2 soft CC, self-sustain, shields, speed buffs, and decent AoE damage, it's not really an issue for her.

AP Ratios are bad... what..? Her Q is a 60%, going up to 90% on the first hit and if you have them CC'd with W, it can do the 60% from the detonation... Her W has a 90% scaling... In just a W+R'd Q, you can do 240% of your AP and 785 base from Q with 260 base from W. That's 1045 base damage... and 2.4x her AP...

I comparison to an actual AP mage, one that's always done well.. Lux. Lux's Q does 260+70%, E does 240+60%, R does 500+75%, and passive does a max of 154+20%. That's 225% Ratio and 1154 base. That's 109 more base for 15% less AP.

Karma ratios are incredibly high, her burst is high, her everything is good. Her only downside is her R's CD is a bit high even if it does go down. Given her reliance on her mantra Q, the best way to fix her isn't to give her more damage or rework her, it's to reduce the CD on her mantra or increase the range on her Q.

You are compairing a long range control mage to a mid range burst mage.

Lux can also hit multiple people with all her abilities and make good picks with q. She is also a fairly safe pic thanks to range and is good waveclear.

Karma has to get up close to do damage which wull open herself up to either getting bursted down or cced (unlessn ofc you want to use your cds on the tanks). And no the movement speed from e will not stop you from getting focused.

Two that fill a similar role to karma are viegar and annie. Both mid range bursters.

Annie has a flash tibbers in her pocket and can 100 to 0 any squishy. 

Viegar does the smae but he can 100 to 0 a tank.

Lissandra is another similar mage but she is used to shut down mobile assasins.

Then I'll show you Annie's abilities...

Annie's Q, 220+80%. W, 250+85%. R, 425+80%. That's 895+245%. Karma does 145 more base for 5% less AP ratio. For 5% to equal 145 means Annie would need 2.8k AP before she did more than Karma... >>

This is on top of the fact that Karma is a poke-based mage with powerful all-in ability. Can she be CC'd and killed? Yeah. So can EVERY mage EVER. Annie is also considered a short range mage where-as Veigar is considered an anti-Mage. Not a certain-range burster. No. Veigar is an anti-mage, though he's more of an anti-squishy since his ratios, while not the highest in the game (60% on Q, 100% on W, 100% on R, totaling 260% which is high, but LB does much, much more surprisingly.), it's still enough to murder most squishies, especially with the AP boost he has as his Q's passive.

Probably because she's not a mid laner, she's a top laner.

Juggernauts? {{champion:122}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:86}}  Never gonna get anywhere near her. She's gonna hammer them from afar with mantra'd Q's, snare them with ease when they charge in, shield away in the event that those two fail.

Tanks? {{champion:36}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:106}} Her disengage and sustain is too strong for them to kill her. 

As a top laner, she excels at dueling during lane phase and being very near ungankable if played well. Late game she's fantastic at keeping her teammates alive, setting up fights, catching out lone enemies, poking, disengaging, engaging, and providing damage. She's also great at locking down stealth champs and mobile champs with W. 

Personally, I think she's a fine champions, very versatile and fun to play. Easily one of my best and favorite champions in this game.

Not to mention you yourself are negative with Karma

Lane phase isn't about killing your opponent, it's about gaining gold while keeping your opponent from gaining gold. You sit between the minions and the tank/juggernaut, forcing them to either miss farm or engage on you and lose the trade. Darius has no sustain if he can't hit you with Q, Garen has no sustain if you keep him from using his passive, Nasus has no sustain unless he can hit something, the list goes on. As for the mages, Karma is easily one of Vlad's biggest counters. Vlad's never going to get near her, will continue to take damage and be snared while in pool, and Karma's core items are morellos and liandrys. 

But enough of that, obviously you're too fixed on my personal w/l with karma top to listen to reason. A true Karma main wouldn't want changes to her.
